locale.title: Airgallet Fighters Wing
locale.synopsis: New enemy declarated wold war III , japan has been invaded , rest of the world has also been invaded, two pilots the team airgallet is not enough ,to combat the threat the general the navy battleship morita kaisaku, orders, finding new pilots to save the world, the elect are shin kazama and mike simon team u.n scuadron, mao mao and malcom team aerofighters, together to defeat the invaders ,to restore world peace.

Un nuevo enemigo ha declarado la III guerra mundial, Japón ha sido invadido, el resto del mundo también ha sido invadido, los dos pilotos del equipo Airgallet no son suficientes para combatir la amenaza. El acorazado de la marina Morita Kaisaku, sus órdenes: la búsqueda de nuevos pilotos para salvar el mundo, los elegidos son Shin Kazama y Mike Simon del equipo Scuadron U.N. Pilota los aviones de combate para derrotar a los invasores.

locale.title: Alien Vs Predator - Aftermath
locale.synopsis: Aliens vs Predator: Aftermath is a remix of the original arcade game, featuring 4 playable characters, new levels, rain effects, and loads of aliens!
Aliens vs Predator: Aftermath est un remix du jeu d'arcade original, avec 4 personnages jouables, de nouveaux niveaux, des effets de pluie et de nombreux extraterrestres!

locale.title: Aliens Clash
locale.synopsis: 2 Alien races have clashed for years, the winner will be decided by the champion of each race Play as the champion of a race. Travel and shoot your way through different worlds and levels. Win your race and defeat the other champion!

locale.title: Armored Warriors Cyberbots
locale.synopsis: In the year 2281, the United Earth Government and the Principalities of Raia signed a ceasefire treaty, ending a war that lasted for half a century. One year after the signing of the treaty, the United Earth Government's 18th scouting party reported that the Raian capital, Melkide, has been captured by an army of unknown origin. The United Earth Government decided to dispatch an army to Raia to retake the capital and rescue its citizens. However, unbeknownst to the general public, the true purpose of this operation was to eliminate the unknown enemy and bring Raia under Earth's control.

locale.title: Art Of Fighting -bor Remix 3
locale.synopsis:
This is based off of the original fighting game Art of Fighting that comes to a Beat Em Up tradition.
Ryo Sakazaki hears that his father, Takuma, is killed (supposedly), and missing. Even his sister, Yuri, is kidnapped. So he contacts Robert Garcia and talked to him about it.

Basé sur le jeu de combat original Art of Fighting qui s'inscrit dans la tradition Beat Em Up.
La sœur de Ryo Sakazaki a été enlevée. Ce dernier décide d'explorer la ville avec l'aide de son ami Robert Garcia pour la retrouver. Ils se retrouvent impliqués dans plusieurs combats.

game.name: Art Of Figting - Trouble In South Town

locale.title: Art Of Figting - Trouble In South Town
locale.synopsis: - The game is similiar to final fight or streets of rage series. - It contains several levels like fighting / bonus stages / interactive levels... - It uses edited characters from King of Fighters and other arcade games. - It has several animated gifs/movies that will show at the end of each boss/ sequence of levels that will take you throw the story. - Approximately 15/20 hours of gameplay if you play very fast. - And much more.

locale.title: Asterix And Caesars Challenge
locale.synopsis: You accompany Asterix and Obelix in their adventures. The game is set up like the old school Batman Returns or King of Dragons. You have an energy bar and use it to perform 2 different attacks and beat the Roman army. You should not forget to jump occasionally as it is helps you to progress in the game.

Vous accompagnez Astérix et Obélix dans leurs aventures. Le jeu est configuré comme la version old school de Batman Returns ou King of Dragons. Vous avez une barre d'énergie et utilisez votre énergie pour effectuer 2 attaques différentes et battre l'armée romaine. Vous avez la possibilité de sauter pour vous déplacer.

Sie begleiten Asterix und Obelix auf ihren Abenteuern. Das Spiel ist wie die alten Batman Returns oder King of Dragons aufgebaut. Du hast einen Energiebalken und verwendest ihn, um 2 verschiedene Angriffe auszuführen und die römische Armee zu besiegen. Sie sollten nicht vergessen, gelegentlich zu springen, da dies Ihnen hilft, im Spiel voranzukommen.

locale.title: Avengers - United Battle Force
locale.synopsis:
Avengers: United Battle Force is an remix of the old Captain America and Avengers arcade game with new chars and many cool things.
Its a 2 players beat-em-up game, featuring Avengers plus some guest chars from Marvel universe.
17 playable characters (+ unlockable characters) 20 supporting characters (between NPC and helpers) 3 chapters, with more than 15 stages Many special powers, including devastating Hyper Moves Alternative route Alternative mode for some characters Bonus stages and aerial stages Intense boss fights 10+ bosses Many items and traps Custom voiced characters Custom loading screens Unique feature - Music tempo changes based on boss life. Works like in Street Fighter 2.

Avengers: United Battle Force est un remix de l'ancien jeu d'arcade Captain America and Avengers avec de nouveaux personnages et de nombreuses choses sympas.
C'est un jeu beat-em-up à 2 joueurs, mettant en vedette les Avengers et quelques personnages invités de l'univers Marvel.
17 personnages jouables (+ personnages débloquables) 20 personnages secondaires (entre PNJ et assistants) 3 chapitres, avec plus de 15 étapes De nombreux pouvoirs spéciaux, dont des Hyper Moves dévastateurs Itinéraire alternatif Mode alternatif pour certains personnages Stades bonus et stades aériens Combats de boss intenses 10+ boss De nombreux objets et pièges Personnages vocalisés personnalisés Écrans de chargement personnalisés Fonctionnalité unique - Le tempo de la musique change en fonction de la vie du boss. Fonctionne comme dans Street Fighter 2.

Avengers: United Battle Force is an remix of the old Captain America and Avengers arcade game with new chars and many cool things.
Its a 2 players beat-em-up game, featuring Avengers plus some guest chars from Marvel universe.
17 playable characters (+ unlockable characters) 20 supporting characters (between NPC and helpers) 3 chapters, with more than 15 stages Many special powers, including devastating Hyper Moves Alternative route Alternative mode for some characters Bonus stages and aerial stages Intense boss fights 10+ bosses Many itens and traps Custom voiced characters Custom loading screens Unique feature - Music tempo changes based on boss life. Works like in Street Fighter 2.

locale.title: Batman Gotham Knights
locale.synopsis: Batman Gotham Knights is Beat'em'all game. Play as Batman, Robin or Batgirl. Face your enemies who will never stop to fight you. Will you manage to reach the Big Boss who controls them all and bring back the peace to Gotham?

Batman Gotham Knights est jeu du type Beat'em'all Incarnez Batman, Robin ou encore Batgirl. Affrontez vos ennemis qui n'auront de cesse de vous barrer la route. Réussirez-vous à atteindre le Big Boss qui les contrôle tous et ramener la paix à Gotham?

locale.title: Battle Arena Toshinden Origin
locale.synopsis: Beat'em all based on the world of Toshinden (PlayStation). The game is very nervous with a lot of enemies.
Beat'em all basé sur l'univers de Toshinden (PlayStation). Le jeu est très nerveux avec beaucoup d'ennemis.

locale.title: Battle Toads
locale.synopsis: The game took eight long months to create, contains five completely different game modes, and four playable characters: Rash, Pimple & Zitz from Battletoads and Sketch Turner from Comix Zone.
Le jeu contient cinq modes de jeu complètement différents et quatre personnages jouables: Rash, Pimple & Zitz de Battletoads et Sketch Turner de Comix Zone.

game.name: Battletoads And Double Dragon Iv - The Return Of The Dark Forces

locale.title: Battletoads And Double Dragon Iv - The Return Of The Dark Forces
locale.synopsis: Faraway, at the very end of this galaxy there is another world race of the galaxy “Canis Major” corporation ruled by Queen of Dark. Defeated Queen of Dark is full of rage and makes up new evil plans of revenge and conquest. She destroyed all fighting units in Oxnard, where battle toads live. She did this with the help of magic and her faithful warriors. The city was at Queen's feet after that. Battletoads and Double Dragon mean the last hope. You must make your way to the Queen of Dark and destroy her with the help of set of fighting skills of each fighter. You are going to experience a hurricane beat'em up with classic characters, improved graphics and nice sound effects. There are also extra game modes available: boss battle and air motorbike races.

Au loin, à la toute fin de cette galaxie, il y a une autre course mondiale de la galaxie «Canis Major» dirigée par La Reine des Ténèbres. Cette dernière, vaincue est pleine de rage et invente de nouveaux plans diaboliques de vengeance et de conquête. Elle a détruit toutes les unités de combat à Oxnard, où vivent les Battletoads. Elle l'a fait avec l'aide de la magie et de ses fidèles guerriers. La ville était aux pieds de La Reine. Battletoads et Double Dragon représentent le dernier espoir. Vous devez vous diriger vers la reine des ténèbres et la détruire à l'aide des techniques de combat de chacun des combattants. Vous allez faire face à un ouragan avec des personnages classiques, des graphismes améliorés et de jolis effets sonores. Il existe également des modes de jeu supplémentaires disponibles: combat de boss et courses de motos aériennes.

game.name: Battletoads Double Dragon - The T.bird Mission

locale.title: Battletoads Double Dragon - The T.bird Mission
locale.synopsis: This is a new part of a famous crossover with the participation of characters from the game series Battletoads and Double Dragon!nnnnThree human-like toads, Rash, Zitz, Pimple and dragon brothers Billy and Jimmy Lee must save professor T. Bird in their new adventures. He is a teacher and a master of the toads, who was kidnapped by the Queen of Dark, who rules Ragnarok planet. It is going to be a really serious battle, toads and dragons will have to fight against numerous enemies and bosses, which are sent by the Queen of Dark. Moreover, evil Queen called Shadow Boss to help her, they act as one team. Choose one of three toads or one of two dragons and conquer the space with the help of your fists!nnThere are 9 different missions in this game, each of them is divided into several parts.

game.name: Beast And Blanka In The Violent World

locale.title: Beast And Blanka In The Violent World

game.name: Beats Of Rage - Street Fighter Edition

locale.title: Beats Of Rage - Street Fighter Edition
locale.synopsis: Beat'Em-Up fighting game with the characters from Street Fighter II. Choose between Ryu, Ken, Chun-Li, Guile, Dhalsim, Yun and fight!
Jeu de combat Beat'Em-Up avec les personnages de Street Fighter II. Choisissez entre Ryu, Ken, Chun-Li, Guile, Dhalsim, Yun et combattez!

game.name: Beats Of Rage Alliance Super Sayan

locale.title: Beats Of Rage Alliance Super Sayan
Beats Of Rage Original
locale.synopsis: Beats of Rage is a customisable video game engine made by Senile Team and inspired by Sega's classic Streets of Rage series. With Beats of Rage, users can create their own beat 'em up games - no programming experience required!nnnnBeats of Rage was first released for DOS in November 2003. It was not advertised in any way other than by word of mouth, yet it soon gained enormous popularity. Ports to many other systems (e.g. Dreamcast, Linux, Windows, GP32, GP2X, etc) soon followed.nn

Beats of Rage est un moteur de jeu vidéo personnalisable développé par Senile Team et inspiré de la série classique Streets of Rage de Sega. Avec Beats of Rage, les utilisateurs peuvent créer leurs propres jeux beat 'em up - aucune expérience de programmation n'est requise! Beats of Rage a été publié pour la première fois pour DOS en novembre 2003. Il n'a pas été annoncé autrement que par le bouche à oreille, mais il a ensuite gagné une énorme popularité. Des ports vers de nombreux autres systèmes (par exemple Dreamcast, Linux, Windows, GP32, GP2X, etc.) ont rapidement suivi.

game.name: Beats Of Rage Remix - Rhythm Of Destruction

locale.title: Beats Of Rage Remix - Rhythm Of Destruction
Beats Of Rage Xtra
locale.synopsis: A new version of Beats of Rage with 4 additional characters: Rock, Mai, Terry / Bogard, Evy / Vanessa
Une nouvelle version de Beats of Rage avec 4 personnages supplémentaires : Rock, Mai, Terry/Bogard, Evy/Vanessa

game.name: Bruce Lee - Revenge Of The Dragon

locale.title: Bruce Lee - Revenge Of The Dragon
Captain Commando And The Avengers
locale.synopsis:
Captain Commando and The Avengers is a Beats of Rage mod created by Gabo-Hanzo which features the superhero from Capcom fighting alongside the Marvel characters.
NOTE: Check 'How To Play' in the game menu for further instructions with the extra character moves available with this BoR mod.

locale.title: Castlevania Legacy Of Dracula
locale.synopsis: In this Beat'Em-Up game, play as one of the five legendary characters from the Castlevania saga. Choose between Alucard, Trevor Belmont, Simon Belmont, Ritcher Belmont or Jonathan Morris. Jump and fight a bunch of ennemies.

Dans ce jeu du style Beat'Em-Up, incarnez l'un des cinq personnages légendaires de la saga Castlevania. Choisissez entre Alucard, Trevor Belmont, Simon Belmont, Ritcher Belmont ou Jonathan Morris. Sautez et combattez vos ennemis, dont certains font une taille gigantesque.

locale.title: City Of Heroes
locale.synopsis: In City of Heroes, play as a superhero and fight the bad guys. Sometimes the DC comics universe, sometimes from the Marvel universe, choose between around twenty crime fighters and let justice prevail!

Dans City of Heroes, incarnez un super-héros et combattez les méchants.Tantôt issu de l'univers de DC comics, tantôt de l'univers Marvel, choisissez parmi une vingtaine de combattants du crime et faites régner la justice!

locale.title: Clafan - Classic Fantasy
locale.synopsis: Retro-styled, semi-open world, RPG beat 'em up hybrid! Choose a character, and go on an adventure! Up to 4 players.
Retro-styled, semi-open world, RPG beat 'em up hybrid! Choose a character, and go on an adventure! Up to 4 players.

locale.title: Clafan Advanced - Classic Fantasy Advanced
locale.synopsis:
ClaFan Advanced is the spiritual successor to ClaFan - Classic Fantasy. But that does not mean it's a sequel, nor is it a replacement for the original. ClaFan and ClaFan Advanced are entirely separate games.
ClaFan Advanced is called that way for a reason. It makes a number of big improvements on ClaFan's gameplay system. Here are some notable changes: The HUD is reduced, the playfield is increased, and enemy lifebars now appear over enemies themselves. Player attack width and range are almost double what they were in original ClaFan--so it's much easier to hit things now. All characters have: a standard 5-hit combo, an aerial combo, a neutral Chain attack, and a mid-combo Chain attack. Melee characters have a secondary mid-combo Chain, as well as an aerial Chain. Magic characters can cast two different spells, assigned to the Magic1 and Magic2 buttons accordingly.
The goal in ClaFan Advanced is to build a stronger emotional connection between the player and the NPC's they are helping. Hopefully, each quest will be bigger and more substantive; almost as if each one is a mini-game in itself. Of course, ambitions are just that: ambitious--and I'm only a one-man show. So it's possible that the quests in ClaFan Advanced will have about the same level of substance as the ones in the original game. Either way, you won't be disappointed.

locale.title: Contra - Locked N Loaded
locale.synopsis:
This mod is an attempt to remake Contra, one of top classic games, with OpenBoR. It's not 100% remade but at least basic and important gameplay is remade
Modes: 3 missions, 1 locked mission & 1 locked boss rush mode
Soldiers : Bill Rizer, Brad Fang, Probotector, Sheena Etranzi, Mad Dog, Bahamut & Lucia
Abilities: - Shoot in 8 direction - Slide (no invincibility though) - Platform drop (disabled in some levels) - Free and fixed shooting mode - Carry 2 weapons but only use one everytime
Disabilities: - Unable to climb walls - Unable to hang to railing - Unable to fire 2 weapons at same time
Features: - 12 different weapons - Health bar which gives 3 hit points for player - Health item to restore health - Motorbike mode - Plenty pseudo travel levels both horizontal and vertical - Challenging bosses and subbosses - Save game is enabled for all missions but Boss Rush
This mod uses 4 buttons, don't forget to define key for each!
Bahamut has similar ability as the other soldiers for balance. His sprites are made by slash128

Mod/Remake du célèbre jeu Contra fait par un fan, l'un des meilleurs jeux classiques, avec OpenBoR.
Jouez l'un des soldats Bill Rizer, Brad Fang, Probotector, Sheena Etranzi, Mad Dog, Bahamut ou Lucia
Capacités des soldats: - Tirez dans 8 directions - Glissade (pas d'invincibilité cependant) - Suppression de la plateforme (désactivée à certains niveaux) - Mode de prise de vue libre et fixe - Porte 2 armes mais n'en utilise qu'une à chaque fois
Incapacitées: - Impossible de grimper aux murs - Impossible d'accrocher à la balustrade - Impossible de tirer 2 armes en même temps
Fonctionnalités: - 12 armes différentes - Barre de santé qui donne 3 points de vie pour le joueur - Article pour rétablir la santé - Mode moto - Beaucoup de pseudo niveaux de déplacements horizontaux et verticaux - Défis contre les boss et les sous-boss - La sauvegarde est activée pour toutes les missions sauf Boss Rush.
Ce mod utilise 4 boutons, n'oubliez pas de définir l'action pour chacun!

locale.title: Crime Buster
locale.synopsis:
You will meet well known characters – beautiful Kula and big Max, who devoted their lives to struggle against evil in the city streets. Only that this time the team is not in full force. You will not see Mandy in this game anymore, but you will meet three new characters: Asians Bao and Athena and American Ralph. It is also worth mentioning that the playing process has many new elements, it is now longer and more difficult. The atmosphere of the game is the same.
You will have to destroy several street gangs of the city, which sell drugs. Be careful, you might be killed if you have several bucks in your pocket. Go ahead, go into cruel battles and street fights.

Vous rencontrerez des personnages bien connus - la belle Kula et le grand Max, qui ont consacré leur vie à lutter contre le mal dans les rues de la ville. Seulement que cette fois l'équipe n'est pas en pleine force. Vous ne verrez plus Mandy dans ce jeu, mais vous rencontrerez trois nouveaux personnages: Asians Bao and Athena et American Ralph. Il convient également de mentionner que le processus de jeu comporte de nombreux éléments nouveaux, il est maintenant plus long et plus difficile. L'atmosphère du jeu est la même.
Vous devrez détruire plusieurs gangs de rue de la ville vendant de la drogue. Soyez prudent, vous pourriez être tué si vous avez plusieurs dollars en poche. Allez-y, participez à des batailles cruelles et à des combats de rue.

locale.title: Crisis Evil 1
locale.synopsis: This is a 2D version of Capcom's popular survival horror game Resident Evil. Play as Chris Redfield or Jill Valentine, blasting and fighting zombies, mutant dogs and other creatures.nnnnThe game mods feature the characters from the Resident Evil game series, not only are the good guys here... the Zombies, Dogs, Plants, Spiders, and even the Nemesis is here!

locale.title: Crisis Evil 2
locale.synopsis: The game takes place at the same time as the events of the first Crisis Evil and features 2 new playable characters: Leon Kennedy and Claire Redfield. All new creatures as well as familiar faces appear in this long awaited sequel.

Il s'agit d'un hack de Beats of Rage. C'est une version 2D en Beat'em all du jeu le plus populaire de Survival-horror de Capcom, Resident Evil. Jouez en tant que Chris Redfield, Jill Valentine, Léon Scott Kennedy ou Claire Redfield et luttez contre les zombies, les chiens mutants et autres créatures.

locale.title: Crisis Evil 3 - Santiago Infected
locale.synopsis: Crisis Evil 3: Santiago Infected is a Beat'em Up game, based on the Resident Evil saga of Capcom. It is the third part of the Openbor Crisis Evil saga, which this time places the action in a hypothetical zombie invasion in the city of Santiago, Chile, because of the mutation of the H1N1 virus. Leon and Claire from Resident Evil, along with some other Capcom characters, must face the threat by cleaning the city of monsters, zombies and other horrible creatures perpetrated by Umbrella.

Crisis Evil 3: Santiago Infected es un juego Beat'em Up, basado en la saga Resident Evil de Capcom. Es la tercera parte de la saga Crisis Evil de Openbor, que en esta ocasión sitúa la acción en una hipotética invasión zombie en la ciudad de Santiago de Chile, a causa de la mutación del virus H1N1. Leon y Claire de Resident Evil, junto con algún personaje más de Capcom, deberán afrontar la amenaza limpiando la ciudad de monstruos, zombies y otras horribles criaturas perpetradas por Umbrella.

Crisis Evil 3: Santiago Infected est un jeu Beat'em Up, basé sur la saga Resident Evil de Capcom. C'est la troisième partie de la saga Openbor Crisis Evil, qui place cette fois l'action dans une hypothétique invasion de zombies dans la ville de Santiago du Chili, à cause de la mutation du virus H1N1. Leon et Claire de Resident Evil, ainsi que d'autres personnages de Capcom, doivent faire face à la menace en nettoyant la ville des monstres, des zombies et d'autres horribles créatures perpétrées par Umbrella.

locale.title: Double Dragon 3 - The Dragon Stone
locale.synopsis: An enjoyable game developed by gabo hanzo , this open bor game is full of special moves that make the old double dragon 3 a decent game to have fun! So what add this remake to the old technos saga? 3 characters gameplay lots of new skills rearranged graphics from the past double dragon games arranged music

Excellent mod qui propose des remakes de la version arcade de Double Dragon 1 et 2 et de la version NES de Double Dragon 2. Le jeu propose trois styles de combat, à vous de découvrir celui qui vous convient le mieux !

locale.title: Double Dragon Extreme
locale.synopsis:
This mod is a fantastic piece of work that feature remakes of the arcade version of Double Dragon 1 and 2 and the NES version of Double Dragon 2.
The game features three fighting styles and its a matter of opinion on which one is the best suited for you.

Excellent mod qui propose des remakes de la version arcade de Double Dragon 1 et 2 et de la version NES de Double Dragon 2. Le jeu propose trois styles de combat, à vous de découvrir celui qui vous convient le mieux.

game.name: Dragon Ball Z - Attack Of The Saiyans

locale.title: Dragon Ball Z - Attack Of The Saiyans

game.name: Dreams Of Rage (nightmare On Elm Street)

locale.title: Dreams Of Rage (nightmare On Elm Street)
locale.synopsis: The man of your dreams is back and this time in, full on, 16-bit glory. Fight through an army of Freddy's past victims, hellish nightmares, and Krueger himself as one of the Dream Warriors. Do you have what it takes?

game.name: Dungeons And Dragons - Knights And Dragons - The Endless Quest

locale.title: Dungeons And Dragons - Knights And Dragons - The Endless Quest

game.name: Dungeons And Dragons - Rise Of Warduke

locale.title: Dungeons And Dragons - Rise Of Warduke

game.name: Ed, Edd, N Eddy - Nightmare On Ed Street

locale.title: Ed, Edd, N Eddy - Nightmare On Ed Street
locale.synopsis: Ed Edd n Eddy: Nightmare on Ed Street is a Beats of Rage mod created by Kungpow and features the characters from the Cartoon Network show traveling through various levels of previously created BoR mods.

Ed Edd n Eddy: Nightmare on Ed Street est un mod Beats of Rage créé par Kungpow et présente les personnages de l'émission Cartoon Network voyageant à travers différents niveaux de mods BoR créés précédemment.

locale.title: Elfen Lied
locale.synopsis:
Elfen Lied is a Beats of Rage mod created by Kelvinblue and is based on the Japanese Manga series created by Lynn Okamoto.
WARNING: This game contains animated nudity.

game.name: Eternal Champions - The Thin Strings Of Fate

locale.title: Eternal Champions - The Thin Strings Of Fate
Evil Dead
locale.synopsis: Play as Ash from Evil Dead. Edit based on Pizzaman's Evil Splatter mod. First mod created by nsw25.

locale.title: Fatal Fury Final
locale.synopsis: According to SEEP, Fatal Fury Final is a remake of the original fighting game made SNK but in beat em up style. The detail including the characters are developed as close as possible to the Neo Geo but twists it up as you can play as the heroes or as the bosses. Also included is your own path such as South Town Quest or the original The King of Fighters Tournament.

Selon SEEP, Fatal Fury Final est un remake du jeu de combat original fait SNK mais dans un beat'em all. Les détails, y compris les personnages, sont développés au plus des originaux de Neo Geo, mais vous pouvez jouer en tant que héros ou en tant que boss.

locale.title: Fatal Fury Re Bout
locale.synopsis: Fatal Fury Final: Re-Bout is a remake of the original fighting game made SNK but in beat em up style.All retro neo geo look in one cool fan made game. You can play as heroes or as bosses, choose your path in the South Town Quest mode or play a the original The King of Fighters tournament.

Fatal Fury Final: Re-Bout est un remake du jeu de combat original fait SNK mais dans le style beat em up. Vous pouvez jouer des héros ou des boss, choisir votre chemin dans le mode South Town Quest ou jouer au tournoi original The King of Fighters.

locale.title: Fatal Fury Re-bout 2
locale.synopsis: This Game is first work by S.E.E.P. Team. The Game-Play is Classic of BOR Engine and the Graphics and Sound is taken from original Fatal Fury 1. Characters; Terry Bogard, Andy Bogard, Joe Higashi, Tung Fu Rue. Boss; Duck King, Richard Mayer, Michael Max, Hwa Jay, Raiden, Billy Kane and Geese Howard... and Much More on Secret Modes.

Ce jeu est la suite du travail de S.E.E.P. Le Gameplay est classique et les graphiques et le son sont tirés de Fatal Fury 1. Personnages originaux; Terry Bogard, Andy Bogard, Joe Higashi, Tung Fu Rue. Boss; Duck King, Richard Mayer, Michael Max, Hwa Jay, Raiden, Billy Kane et Geese Howard ... et bien plus avec les modes secrets.

locale.title: Final Fight - The Last Round
locale.synopsis:
There are three versions (only 3rd version is 4player):
The first version contains characters from Final Fight 1 & 2: Guy, Cody, Haggar, Maki & Carlos
The second version features the complete character cast from Final Fight 3: Guy, Haggar, Lucia & Dean In the original Final Fight: The Last Round all of these were hidden extra characters.
The third version was a Dreamcast exclusive 4 player version of Final Fight: The Last Round that features the Street Fighter characters (players & bosses!) from Hyper Final Fight 1 & 2:
Guy, Cody, Cammy, Guile, DeeJay & Fei Long Bosses: Vega, Bison, Sagat, Balrog & Rolento

locale.title: Final Fight Alpha
locale.synopsis: Final Fight Aplha is a fan game which is heavily based on the well-known Capcom saga and Street Fighter Alpha series. The result is a pretty good beat em' up with a really cool graphics and a classic-soldid gameplay. The game, created with the OpenBOR engine, includes 8 characters which you can select (and much more secrets), four of which are from the Street Fighter saga. Each one of them has their own special moves and they all have to go through 8 stages with many different enemies and bosses to defeat. Do you think you can stop the evil project of Shadowlaw?

locale.title: Final Fight Apocalypse - 2nd Edition
locale.synopsis: 4 playable characters - Haggar, Cody, Guy and Scorp (from Saturday Nite Slam Masters) 4-player simultaneous gameplay Tons of special moves for each character, as well as useable weapons (uncommon for most BOR mods) Challenging enemies who block, teleport and won't hesitate to throw you around!

game.name: Final Fight Gold Plus Lns V2.0

locale.title: Final Fight Gold Plus Lns V2.0
Final Fight Hyper 1
locale.synopsis: An excellent mod featuring all the nice graphics, sounds and characters from Final Fight.

locale.title: Final Fight Hyper 2
locale.synopsis: 1 single story + boss rush. A mod technically superior to HFF1! - 6 playable characters: Haggar, Cody, Guy, Lucia, Carlos and DeeJay! - New and deadly enemies and bosses! - 7 challenging stages, bringing new stuff to BoR experience! - EX Boss Rush mode (finish the game to unlock!) - New cinemas!

game.name: Final Fight Vs King Of Fighters

locale.title: Final Fight Vs King Of Fighters
Fire Emblem Castle Defense
locale.synopsis: An action tower defense game; the very first of its kind on OpenBOR! 11 characters to choose from, 2 game modes, 2 unlockable modes, and lots of fun.

game.name: G.i. Joe - Assault On Cobra Island

locale.title: G.i. Joe
locale.synopsis: Fight on foot and in vehicles as you battle your way over land, under sea and in the air to the depths of Cobra Island, in attempt to stop a doomsday missile from being launched before it's too late!nnnnBeat Story Mode to unlock more missions!

Combattez à pied et à bord de véhicules pour vous frayer un chemin sur la terre, sous la mer et dans les airs jusqu'aux profondeurs de l'île Cobra, afin d'empêcher le lancement d'un missile apocalyptique avant qu'il ne soit trop tard!

game.name: Godzilla - Ultraman - Gamera! All Out Monster War!

locale.title: Godzilla - Ultraman - Gamera! All Out Monster War!
locale.synopsis:
A four-player giant monster classic arcade beat em up (quite the mouthful, I know) starring japan's three greatest giant monstars- Godzilla! Ultraman! and Gamera! 11 Characters in total (plus 7 bonus) with 17 levels and a boss rush mode to top it off. Currently a work in progress.
PLAYABLE CHARACTERS: Godzilla (1975) Ultraman Gamera King Kong Rodan Ultraman Tiga Mothra Kiryu Ultraseven Gomora Anguirus
UNLOCKABLE CHARACTERS: Godzilla (1954) Godzilla (1965) Godzilla (1991) Gigan Biollante Megalon Megaguirus Orga

game.name: Golden Axe Curse Of Death Adder

locale.title: Golden Axe Curse Of Death Adder
Golden Axe Genesis
locale.synopsis:
This release is a tribute to the Golden Axe series of games released for the Sega Mega Drive, which was known as the Sega Genesis in America.
Features -13 different playable characters -4 hidden characters -3 game modes (Story, Original and The Duel) -Story Mode with multiple routes -A total of 21 stages -The Duel with 20 missions and 15 exclusive arenas -More than 20 different enemies -Three beasts to ride -Exclusive features for each character -1 to 4 players simultaneously -Original Soundtrack

locale.title: Golden Axe Legend
locale.synopsis: In olden times, the majestic gods which governed the earth did use the battle axe called "Golden Axe" to banish evil giants. At length, a new generation was come. Humans appeared above the earth and were inherited that battle axe. The departed gods left a final message: "The Axe must bring justice and peace and not be used to unleash dark-rooted evil and destruction..." But one day, a mysterious death lord suddenly appeared. Allied with an evil entity, he stole the Golden Axe. With his entire demon army, he overran the kingdom of Splash Hill, in mid-Eastland, imprisoned and enslaved the people. It was soon quite clear to Gilius Thunderaxe, a member of the long living Dwarf race, that the axe must be retrieved by any means necessary. Gilius sought brave warriors to save the people from this crisis. Before long, there were 6 heroes standing before him.

Dans les temps anciens, les dieux majestueux qui gouvernaient la terre utilisaient la hache de bataille appelée "Golden Axe" pour bannir les méchants géants. Enfin, une nouvelle génération était venue. Les humains sont apparus à la surface de la terre et ont été hérités de cette hache de bataille. Les dieux disparus ont laissé un dernier message: "La hache doit apporter la justice et la paix et ne pas être utilisée pour libérer le mal et la destruction enracinés dans l'ombre ..." Mais un jour, un mystérieux seigneur de la mort apparut soudainement. Allié à une entité diabolique, il a volé la Hache Dorée. Avec toute son armée de démons, il envahit le royaume de Splash Hill, au centre de l'Eastland, emprisonna et asservit le peuple. Gilius Thunderaxe, membre de la race des nains ayant une longue vie, a rapidement compris que la hache devait être récupérée par tous les moyens nécessaires. Gilius a cherché des guerriers courageux pour sauver le peuple de cette crise. Avant longtemps, il y avait 6 héros debout devant lui.

8 playable characters Branching Paths Multiple Endings Rideable Creatures
Important!: when mapping buttons make sure you use attack2 because the 2 attack buttons become combos.

locale.title: Guilty Gear The Crusades
locale.synopsis: A decent OpenBOR game that's based on Guilty Gear. The graphics are a bit on the mediocre side, since the GG characters are missing frames of animation, the enemies are "familiar", and the game has the default physics, but if you can get past these aspects it's alright. Playable characters: Sol Badguy, Ky Kiske, Potemkin, Baiken, Hayato (Star Gladiator), Ceil (Melty Blood)
Spielbare Charaktere: Sol Badguy, Ky Kiske, Potemkin, Baiken, Hayato (Star Gladiator), Ceil (Melty Blood)
Personagens jogáveis: Sol Badguy, Ky Kiske, Potemkin, Baiken, Hayato (Star Gladiator), Ceil (Melty Blood)

game.name: Halloween - The Wrath Of Michael Myers

locale.title: Halloween - The Wrath Of Michael Myers
He-man
locale.synopsis:
He-Man and the Masters of the Universe is a beat'em up that allows you to control He-Man, Man-at-Arms, Orko and the rest of the group to fight the terrible forces of evil led by Skeletor.
You can choose between several main characters of the series, participating in the game simultaneously. Each character has their own attacks and special abilities. He-Man, for example, uses his sword to make special attacks, while Man-at-Arms has a fire-based weapon.
The adventure of He-Man and the Masters of the Universe brings you two different phases: on foot, when you fight enemies normally, and mounted, when traveling at full speed through the levels.

He-Man and the Masters of the Universe est un beat'em up qui vous permet de contrôler He-Man, Man-at-Arms, Orko et le reste du groupe pour combattre les terribles forces du mal menées par Skeletor.
Vous pouvez choisir entre plusieurs personnages principaux de la série, qui participent tous au jeu simultanément. Chaque personne possède ses propres attaques et habiletés spéciales. He-Man, par exemple, utilise son épée pour faire des attaques spéciales, tandis que Man-at-Arms possède une arme basée sur le feu.
L'aventure d'He-Man and the Masters of the Universe vous amène deux phases différentes : à pied, lorsque vous combattez des ennemis normalement, et monté, lorsque vous voyagez à pleine vitesse à travers les niveaux.

locale.title: Hiryu No Ken
locale.synopsis: -4 characters: Rick, Willer, Hayato, Mary -gameplay same the original -long game -many skills -'coz the bug in copy files the boss "blue" was out -transformation!

locale.title: Ikari Warriors 2010
locale.synopsis: Ikari Warriors 2010 is the spiritual successor of POW 2010. Like POW 2010, Ikari Warriors 2010 have a look ispirated from The King of Fighters series and a solid combat batle system. This is a fan made spin off of the original SNK saga created with OpenBOR engine, allow choose three heroes and fight in a classic arcade beat em up way.

locale.title: Joe And Mac - Caveman Ninja
locale.synopsis: Joe and Mac: Caveman Ninja is a BoR mod created by Belavi as a tribute to the classic Joe and Mac video game series. The mod manages to capture the original Joe and Mac atmosphere and keeps the entertainment value with its characters and animations.

locale.title: Justice League United
locale.synopsis: Play as one of 14 members of the Justice League in this Beat'Em-Up. Each hero has special powers. Battle a horde of enemies on land, under the sea or in the air. Will you be able to defeat one of the most powerful enemies in the DC Comics universe? No one but Darkseid himself...

Incarnez parmi 14 membres de la Justice League dans ce Beat'Em-Up. Chaque héros possède des pouvoirs spéciaux. Affrontez une horde d'ennemis sur terre, sous la mer ou dans les airs. Réussirez-vous à vaincre un des plus puissants ennemis de tout l'univers de DC Comics? Nul autre que Darkseid en personne...

locale.title: Kill Bill Vol 1
locale.synopsis: Kill Bill Volume 1 is a Beats of Rage mod created by Demitri and is based on the characters from the action thriller film of the same name created by Quentin Tarantino in 2003.

locale.title: Kill Ryu 1
locale.synopsis: Kill Ryu Volume 1 is a BoR mod created by Psmagazine as a parody of the movie Kill Bill. The mod features characters from Capcom's classic Street Fighter video games and a playable tutorial.

locale.title: Kill Ryu 2
locale.synopsis: Kill Ryu Volume 2 is a BoR mod created by Psmagazine, it is a continuation with the parody of the movie Kill Bill. The mod picks up where Kill Ryu Volume 1 left off, it also features characters from Capcom's classic Street Fighter video games and a playable tutorial.nnnn

locale.title: Lift
locale.synopsis: Save skyscrapers from evil robots group called Falcor!nnPlay as Light Intelligent Falcor Terminator and terminatennFalcor for good!

locale.title: Maplevania
locale.synopsis:
What originally started out as a joke project, and then became a serious game as time went on. Castlevania, arcade style, with sprites from Maplestory!
This game is in Maple style but based off of the Castlevania series. It has three characters in the game.
-3 playable characters -6 stages -Two basic commands: Jump and Attack

Ce qui a commencé à l'origine était un projet "farce", puis est devenu un jeu sérieux à mesure que le temps passait. Castlevania, style arcade, avec des personnages aux allures de lutins dans le style Maplestory!
Il y a trois personnages dans le jeu, 6 étapes et deux commandes de base, soit sauter et attaquer

What originally started out as a joke project, and then became a serious game as time went on. Castlevania, arcade style, with sprites from Maplestory!
This game is in Maple style but based off of the Castlevania series. It has three characters in the game.
-3 playable characters -6 stages -Two basic commands: Jump and Attack

locale.title: Marvel - First Alliance
locale.synopsis: Marvel First Alliance is an indie game developed by ZVitor, created with the popular OpenBor engine, that crossover many aspects of the Marvel universe. The game is a beat'em up inspired by the likes of Streets of Rage and Double Dragon and features a dream team that will certainly please any Marvel fan. But best of all, it features simultaneous four-player action in one computer!

Marvel First Alliance est un jeu indépendant développé par ZVitor, créé avec le populaire moteur OpenBor, qui couvre de nombreux aspects de l'univers Marvel. Le jeu est un beat'em up inspiré par les styles de Streets of Rage et Double Dragon et propose une équipe de rêve qui saura plaire à tous les fans de Marvel. Mais le meilleur de tout, vous pourrez jouer à 4 joueurs simultanément.

locale.title: Marvel - First Alliance 2
locale.synopsis:
Sequel of Marvel First Alliance game, Marvel First Alliance 2 is a beat 'em up where you can choose between tons of famous characters from the Marvel universe to lead a fight against the forces of evil led by Red Skull, who is trying to take over the world.
Marvel First Alliance 2 has four different playing modes. In all, you can visit eight different zones divided into more than twenty levels packed full of enemies, including some special bosses.

Suite de Marvel First Alliance, Marvel First Alliance 2 est un jeu où vous pouvez choisir entre des tonnes de personnages célèbres de l'univers Marvel pour mener un combat contre les forces du mal menées par Red Skull, qui tente de prendre le contrôle du monde.
Marvel First Alliance 2 dispose de quatre modes de jeu différents. En tout, vous pouvez visiter huit zones différentes divisées en plus de vingt niveaux remplis d'ennemis, y compris des boss spéciaux.

locale.title: Marvel - Infinity War
locale.synopsis:
Adam Warlock warns the earth of the Infinity Stones being sought by Magus, and so earth's heroes divide into teams to collect each Gem. These gems are placed into the possession of The Enchantress, MODOK, Selene, Ronan the Accuser, and Russia's superheroes.
In the end, the gathering of the heroes is what allows Magus to collect them all and try to wipe the floor with them.
Marvel Infinity War is a module created by ZVitor, based on the Marvel Comics Universe, and is a sequel to the Marvel First Alliance series. The game has 74 (soon to be 80+) playable characters plus one secret character. There are also over 36 bosses to contend with. The game uses a six-button control scheme. Each character has at least one special move and an ultra move. There are also many special assist characters to summon.

Adam Warlock avertit le monde que les gemmes de l'infini sont recherchées par Magus. Les héros de la Terre se divisent en équipes pour récupérer chaque gemme. Ces gemmes sont en possession de l'Enchanteresse, MODOK, Séléné, Ronan l'Accusateur et des super-héros russes.
Marvel Infinity War est un module créé par ZVitor, basé sur l'univers de Marvel Comics, et faisant suite à la série Marvel First Alliance. Le jeu contient 74 personnages (bientôt 80+) jouables plus un personnage secret. Il y a aussi plus de 36 patrons avec qui se battre. Le jeu utilise un schéma de contrôle à six boutons. Chaque personnage a au moins un coup spécial et un coup ultra. Il y a aussi beaucoup de personnages spéciaux à invoquer.

locale.title: Marvel - War Of The Gems
locale.synopsis: Thanos mounts the six Infinity Gems on his left glove to form the titular Infinity Gauntlet. Each Gem grants its bearer complete mastery over one aspect of the universe: Time, Space, Mind, Soul, Reality, and Power. Now all-powerful and desperate to win the affections of Death, Thanos decides to offer the entity a gift of love by completing a task she had given him, erasing half the sentient life in the universe (including most of the X-Men, Daredevil, and the Fantastic Four), quite literally with a snap of his fingers. The surviving heroes on Earth band together guided by the newly-resurrected Adam Warlock to battle Thanos. In a bid to impress Death, Thanos allows the heroes a slight chance of winning. Can you save the universe?

Thanos place les six Gemmes de l'infini sur son gant pour former le Gant de L'infini. Chaque gemme confère à son détenteur la maîtrise complète d'un aspect de l'univers: le temps, l'espace, l'esprit, l'âme, la réalité et le pouvoir. Désormais tout-puissant et désespéré de gagner l'affection de la Mort, Thanos décide d'offrir à l'entité un cadeau d'amour en accomplissant une tâche qu'elle lui avait confiée, en effaçant la moitié de la vie sensible de tout l'univers, littéralement, en un claquement de doigts. Les héros survivants sur Terre forment un groupe guidé par Adam Warlock, récemment ressuscité, pour combattre Thanos. Dans le but d'impressionner la Mort, Thanos donne aux héros une légère chance de gagner. Pouvez-vous sauver l'univers?

game.name: Mass Effect - Dark Corners Of The Galaxy

locale.title: Mass Effect - Dark Corners Of The Galaxy
Megaman - The Power War (ep1)
locale.synopsis: The first of a series of mods. Classic MegaMan style gameplay, arcade style fun! Fight your way to Wily in this MegaMan: Power Battle/Fighters inspired mod. Includes 5 playable characters, each with helpers that can be summoned. Based on MegaMan 1.

locale.title: Megaman - War Of The Past
locale.synopsis: Megaman: War Of The Past has the unique distinction of being the first fully completed Beats of Rage mod. Created by DCSteve in 2004, the mod displayed many features which would lead the way for even more enhancements to the original game module. The mod also influenced the further development of the Beats of Rage game engine, which eventually became OpenBoR.

locale.title: Megaman Armada
locale.synopsis: MegaMan Armada is a MegaMan game by fans, for fans! Grab three friends and jump-and-shoot your way through several familiar levels--remixed for 4-player arcade action! Tired of playing as the Blue Bomber? Then take on the Robot Masters as Mario, Solid Snake, Vegeta, and many other characters!

locale.title: Metal Gear Origin
locale.synopsis: Play as Solid Sknake and fight your enemies in this Beat'Em-Up create for Openbor.
Incarnez Solid Sknake et combatterz vos ennemis dans ce Beat'Em-Up créer pour Openbor.

locale.title: Metal Slug - Resistance
locale.synopsis: Choose between two characters from the Metal Slug saga and battle a horde of enemies in this Beat'Em-Up / Run and Gun created by fans, for fans. Explosive atmosphere at the rendezvous.
Choisissez entre 2 personnage de la saga Metal Slug et affrontez une horde d'ennemis dans ce Beat'Em-Up/Run and Gun créer par des fans, pour des fans. Ambiance explosive au rendez-vous.

game.name: Moon Stone - A Hard Day's Knight

locale.title: Moon Stone - A Hard Day's Knight
Mortal Kombat Outworld Assassins
locale.synopsis: Play as one of the three famous ninja among Scorpion, Sub-Zero or Noob Saibot of the Mortal Kombat franchise in this Beat'Em-Up created for Openbor. Fight your way by facing a multitude of enemies including the best known of the MK universe. Can you defeat the dreaded Quan Chi?

Incarnez l'un des trois célèbres ninja parmi Scorpion, Sub-Zero ou Noob Saibot de la franchise Mortal Kombat dans de Beat'Em-Up créer pour Openbor. Frayez votre chemin en affrontant une multitude d'ennemis dont les plus connus de l'univers MK. Parviendrez-vous à vaincre le redoutable Quan Chi?

locale.title: Mortal Kombat Unlimited
locale.synopsis: Play as one of the famous characters of the Mortal Kombat franchise in Beat'Em-Up create for Openbor. Choose between Scorpion, Sub-Zero, Raiden, Kitana, Kung-Lao, John Cage, Liu Kang or Jax. Fight your way by facing a multitude of enemies. Can you defeat the dreaded Shaokahn?

Incarnez l'un des célèbres personnage de la franchise Mortal Kombat dans de Beat'Em-Up créer pour Openbor. Choisissez entre Scorpion, Sub-Zero, Raiden, Kitana, Kung-Lao, Johny Cage, Liu Kang ou Jax. Frayez votre chemin en affrontant une multitude d'ennemis. Parviendrez-vous à vaincre le redoutable Shaokahn?

locale.title: Neon Lightning Force
locale.synopsis:
The year is 2044. After the events of world war 3, the United States and European Union are no more, so utterly devastated they were by the nuclear fallout. the power vacuum in northern America gave rise to the "Pacific Union", with Neopolis as it's capital in South America.
While the world is still at peace, the Neopolis police still fights the crimes in it's city, even as they are getting more violent by the day.
They send a special agent, Isolde Shinwara, to investigate those cases finding traces of drako, a drug that makes a person stronger and aggressive. As follows the case, she will find it leads to a much more dangerous, and corrupt, path that was originally thought...

locale.title: Night Slashers X
locale.synopsis: At the base, the game Night Slashers was released on arcade in 1994. It is a game of horror atmosphere from Data East. During the course of the game, the player must beat hordes of attacking zombies and mutants, as well as other enemies, such as wolves or elementals. Bosses are also stereotype monsters, like mummies, golems, and look-alikes of Count Dracula and Frankenstein's monster. Choose to play as Christopher, Jake or Jasmine.

À la base, le jeu Night Slashers est sorti sur borne d'arcade en 1994. C'est un jeu d'ambiance horreur de Data East. Durant le cours du jeu, le joueur doit battre des hordes de zombies et de mutants qui attaquent, ainsi que d'autres ennemis, comme des loups ou des élementaires. Les boss sont aussi des monstres stéréotypes, comme des momies, des golems, et des sosies du Comte Dracula et du monstre de Frankenstein. Choisissez d'incarner Christopher, Jake ou Jasmin.

locale.title: Pocket Dimensional Clash
locale.synopsis: Pocket Dimensional Clash is a 2D action fighting beat-'em-up that features characters from the Capcom, Sega, and Nintendo universes.

locale.title: Power Rangers - Beats Of Power
locale.synopsis: The game is designed as a retro throwback to classic 1990s Power Rangers games such as the Mighty Morphin Power Rangers games for the SNES and the Genesis and Power Rangers: The Fighting Edition. In March of 2017, the game was updated with a Special Edition version released.

Le jeu est conçu comme un retour aux jeux rétros classiques des années 1990 dans l'univers Power Rangers tels que les jeux Mighty Morphin Power Rangers pour la SNES et la Mega Drive et Power Rangers: The Fighting Edition. En mars 2017, le jeu a été mis à jour avec une version Special Edition.

locale.title: Rainbow
locale.synopsis:
Fly your way through shape based dungeons and shoot colored shapes with same colored beam. Correct beam will destroy them while wrong one will have side effect depending on the shape. Avoid the shapes, get powerups and survive! Can you destroy the shapes and survive 5 stages in this challenging colorful adventure?
Version1 was made for Shoot'em up Jam. Version 2 is the post jam and updated version

locale.title: Return Of The Double Dragon
locale.synopsis:
Return of Double Dragon is a Beats of Rage Mod tribute to the Technos Japan series of beat 'em up games that originated back in 1987. The original Double Dragon games spanned over some classic consoles including the Nintendo Entertainment System (NES), Sega Master System (SMS), Atari 2600, Nintendo Game Boy, Sega Genesis / Mega Drive and Atari Lynx.
"This really is a must-have; even for people who never played Double Dragon before. It features the original plot that this game was supposed to have, but sadly got cut into the versions we all know..." - Mr.Q

locale.title: Rhythm Of Destruction 1 Black
locale.synopsis: Also known as Beats of Rage Remix, this is a BoR mod created by Mr.Q!. It is based on the original Beats of Rage and contains new music, different stages and different characters.

game.name: Rhythm Of Destruction 2 - Street Fighter Edition

locale.title: Rhythm Of Destruction 2 - Street Fighter Edition
locale.synopsis:
Rhythm of Destruction comes in four different PAKs and uses the original BoR engine, not OpenBoR. It took almost 7 months to complete and features a total of 16 playable characters.
Street Fighter Version - Featuring SF Remixes (KH & Q) Ryu Ken Guile Dhalsim Chun Li Yun

Rhythm of Destruction comes in four different PAKs and uses the original BoR engine, not OpenBoR. It took almost 7 months to complete and features a total of 16 playable characters.
Blue Version - Featuring More Trance (Mr.Q®) Evy (Vanessa 2k2) Sunrai (Athena 2k2) Mina Inferno (Kula - Fire Edit) Clint (Clark 2k2) Kim (2k2)

locale.title: Rhythm Of Destruction 3 Green
locale.synopsis:
Rhythm of Destruction comes in four different PAKs and uses the original BoR engine, not OpenBoR. It took almost 7 months to complete and features a total of 16 playable characters.
Green Version - Featuring Classic SNK Arcade Tunes Axel Stone (Edit) Keith (Terry 2k3) Sunrei (Athena 2k2) Clint (Clark 2k2) Kim (2k2)

locale.title: Rhythm Of Destruction 4 Red
locale.synopsis:
Rhythm of Destruction comes in four different PAKs and uses the original BoR engine, not OpenBoR. It took almost 7 months to complete and features a total of 16 playable characters.
Red Version - Featuring Trance Music (kingherb) Axel Stone (Edit) Aki (Shiki) Shinryu (Jhun) Mai Frost (Kula - Ice Edit) Keith (Terry 2k3)

locale.title: Road Rash Revolution
locale.synopsis: Road Rash Revolution is a Beats of Rage mod created by Predator002 and is based on the classic Road Rash videogame series for Mega Drive / Genesis. The mod put a unique twist to the conventional BoR games being created at the time - it turned the mod world on its side, literally.

game.name: Sailor Moon Alternate Story - Clone Attack

locale.title: Sailor Moon Alternate Story - Clone Attack
Sega Brawlers Mega Mix
locale.synopsis:
SEGA Brawlers Megamix is an awesome fan made retro side-scrolling beat-em-up that features a roster of about 74 characters from SEGA classics like Sonic, Toejam & Earl, Streets of Rage, Golden Axe, Guardian Heroes, Comix Zone, Shinobi, Vector Man, Ristar, and other multiplatform games like Earthworm Jim, Battletoads and Splatterhouse.
It's a wonderful love letter to SEGA's 16-Bit heyday and a remarkably fun 4 player beat-em-up. The amount of work that's gone into the game is incredible, all the characters have their own move sets and special moves, the soundtrack is fantastic and all the levels and enemies are based on classics, such as Streets of Rage, Golden Axe and Sonic. There's even a Vs Battle mode, as well as various unlockable gameplay modes and characters unlocked by completing the main adventure.
The game's still in development, and could do with a little more variety in the main adventure mode and some bigger bosses, but the massive character roster certainly makes up for these minor shortfalls. It's a fantastic homage to SEGA, 16-bit gaming and classic side-scrolling arcade beat-em-ups. Remarkably, the dev (DJGameFreakTheIguana) is still planning to add even more characters to the game. There really can't be many more 16-bit SEGA characters out there ? Ecco the Dolphin maybe?
-Set controls for Attacks 1,2,3, & 4, all of them are used. Attack 1 is used for combo attacks, some characters have only 1 strike to knuck enemies away. Attacks 2 3 & 4 are used to perform different special moves. Some characters can use more moves by pressing one of the button while moving.
-Special is a strong move most characters use to blast many enemies away in different ways. Some do combos, shoot power shots, effect much of the screen, or blast through the stage blasting anyone in their way. Some of them(Mainly the Steets of Rage fighters) have a second special that can be used while holding left or right.
-Most characters are able to grab enemies by walking into them. You can pummel by pressing attack, perform different finishers by pressing attack while holding up or down, and can throw or perform a different attack while pressing your controls behind you(If you grab while facing right, hold left on your key/contoller)
-In battle mode, there are 2 different stages. 3D stages allow you to move in all diresctions(Like steets of Rage), but on 2D stages, you can only move left or right(Like Sonic
-in 2D stages, you can perform moves to jump up platforms too high to reach with a normal jump by holding down and pressing the jump key, or jump down the platform by holding down and pressing attack. Most characters can attack during these jumps, so watch for enemies over or under you
-There are only 3 modes to play, Adventure, Arcade, and Battle. Beating adventure mode will unlock the other modes. Most of them are the same except Aliiance mode and Mission mode. In all of these locked modes, you can play as the secret characters. They will still show up as ? marks on the screen, but keep going through the characters as you would and they will appear.

locale.title: Simpsons Treehouse Of Horror
locale.synopsis:
Paying homage to the classic arcade game. This story revolves around an Alien Invasion trying to take over earth. Homer, Bart and Krusty work there way through the Aliens as they unleash all sorts of enemies and even teleport characters from other times and dimensions to assist them.
Features of the game. Loads of exciting levels and environments, characters and bosses (including characters not just from Simpsons lore but also Futurama and Family Guy cameos) mini game set in a makeshift kwik e mart where you can get bonus lives. vehicle levels Big boss battles NPCs who can assist you weapons
Includes Bonus games ! Reclaim Burns Manor: Where you are Vampire Mr Burns and you must stop criminals from looting your mansion Tournament mode: Where you must face enemies in one on one combat Family Guy: where you are Peter and see the events that unfold before he and his family are teleported to Springfield Gallery mode: special images for your viewing pleasure
- 2 player co-op - 2 playable characters/ 1 secret playable character - Based off of my original manga series - 5 chapters - Complete Story/Ending - nice sprite edits

locale.title: Skull Kingz Remake
locale.synopsis: - 4 player co-op - 5 playable characters - Brand New Story - More Boss Fights - Unlockable Gallery Mode/ with hand drawn artwork! - 10 chapters - New Gameplay with more combos! - Complete Story/Ending - new sprite edits

locale.title: Sonic Liberations (saturday Morning Cartoon)
locale.synopsis:
Sonic SatAM Liberations is a 4-player fan game based on the 1993 American TV series, Sonic The Hedgehog--better known as Sonic SatAM. It's primarily developed by NickyP, and co-developed by DJGameFreakTheIguana (developer of Sega Brawlers Megamix). The game features six playable characters, several Zones with two Acts each, and clips from the actual TV series as cutscenes in-game.
There are three game modes: Story, Arcade, and Character Profiles. Story Mode is the game as it was intended, with cutscenes and all. Arcade Mode is identical to Story, but without the cutscenes. And Character Profiles will let you view a brief history of the main cast to familiarize yourself with the series.

game.name: Spider-man And Venom – Maximum Carnage Returns

locale.title: Spider-Man & Venom – Maximum Carnage Returns
locale.synopsis: Spider-Man & Venom – Maximum Carnage Returns features the Spider-Man, Venom and Deadpool characters as well as various ninemics from the classic Spider-Man & Venom – Maximum Carnage, originally released in 1994 for Super Nintendo and Mega Drive / SEGA Genesis.

locale.title: Splatterhouse 1 Deception Of The Mask
locale.synopsis: 4 playable characters new moves and specials for every Rick version 10 stages, 19 substages 19 different enemies + 10 Bosses

locale.title: Splatterhouse 2 Journey Through Hell
locale.synopsis: 4 playable characters new moves and specials for every Rick version 6 long stages 23 different enemies + 6 Bosses
4 personajes para jugar Nuevos movimientos y golpes especiales para Rick 6 largos escenarios 23 diferentes enemigos + 6 jefes

locale.title: Splatterhouse 3 Back To Light
locale.synopsis: 4 playable characters new moves and specials for every Rick version 6 long stages 28 different enemies + 6 Bosses

locale.title: Street Fighter Ultimate Collection
locale.synopsis: Street Fighter Ultimate Collection is considered to be one of the best fan made games in the origin series. There are over 12 character can be selectable include Namco's bonuhttps://streetfighter.fandom.com/wiki/Forum:Street_Fighter_Ultimate_Collections character is added in the bonus game. The download only available for the members since it was the 10th collectors of Ericard Production game made.

locale.title: Street Of Rage 2x
locale.synopsis: An epic Streets of Rage mod! - 4 players at the same time - New "Air combo" system (with juggle control) - New "Hit" and "Max Hit" counter - New "Rage" special skill - New "Special" and "Guard" bars - New "Block" and "Guard break" ability - Random regular enemy "Spawn" - Random "Dropped itens" from obstacles - Improved enemy A.I. and skills - All "Enemies" and "Bosses" are playable - Some improved graphic effects - And constantly updated with bug corrections and new content

locale.title: Super Street Fighter 2 Turbo Hd Remix

game.name: Super Thundercats - The Lost Eye Of Thundera

locale.title: Super Thundercats - The Lost Eye Of Thundera
Super Universe Brawl
locale.synopsis:
Super Universe Brawl is a mod DJGameFreakTheIguana started a while back for OpenBOR where he can work on new ideas he has and even older demos he started all in one place.
DJGameFreakTheIguana: -The first 3 stages from the menu are mostly random and just for people to play on. Demo1 specifically was based on the flash movie, VG Exiles, Stryker vs M.Bison. I've wanted to make mods based on that and other similar flash movies along with my own ideas, so this is just one example.
-DemoX was made for Megaman X, Zero, and Axl for a project I'd like to start in the future. When you see the select screen, the cast for this mod are in the middle row. I formally featured Samus but she was taken out due to Nintendo's recent practice's when it comes to fan games, and she will be replaced in the future.
-Cosmic Damage is an old project of mine I haven't worked on in years. I brought it over into this mod so I can work on it again.
-Beast Mode is a concept based on Pokemon and Digimon where you fight alongside your monsters, Cyber Beats or CyBeasts for short, against other fighters and gangs in an urban sci-fi setting. I was formally making a pokemon beat'm up game years back but I also stopped to due to said practices of Nintendo. Soon I decided to take this concept I came up with years ago and run with it. There's still more I have to do, and due to the nature of this, only the main character for it can be selected here, Guy from DS fighting game Draglade, renamed Adeg after the MMA fighter, Benjamin Adegbuyi.
-Gundam vs Monsters was just added recently. I wanted to make a Gundam game after watching a few different series out of the franchise, including the ones featured recently on Toonami. In this mode, Wing.0 and Deathscythe are the only characters available here while you take down monsters. More Gundams will be featured in the future.

locale.title: Tale Of Vengeance, A
locale.synopsis: This game tells a story about five warriors, having their own vengeance on their loved ones against each of their nemeses. Their own nemeses await upon them to fight. All five warriors meet together and team up for vengeance.

Este juego cuenta la historia de cinco guerreros vengando a sus seres queridos contra cada uno de sus enemigos. Sus propias Némesis están esperando a que luchen. Los cinco guerreros se reúnen y se unen para vengarse.

Ce jeu raconte l'histoire de cinq guerriers vengeant leurs proches contre chacun de leurs ennemis. Leurs propres Némésis les attendent pour se battre. Les cinq guerriers se rencontrent et font équipe pour se venger.

game.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Red Sky Battle

locale.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Red Sky Battle
locale.synopsis:
This game is a continuation of BonusJZ's abandoned TMNT Wrath of the Shredder. This game was developed for pc, with a special unlocker to unlock special characters. Codes can be found throughout the game. Unlock codes are:
SLASH Where is my binky?!
CASEY JONES outlaw hero
FOOT SOLDIER evil as good
There are also hidden codes for more lives & continues

Este juego es una continuación del abandonado TMNT Wrath of the Shredder de BonusJZ. El juego fue desarrollado para pc, con un desbloqueador especial para desbloquear personajes especiales. Los códigos se pueden encontrar a lo largo de todo el juego.

Warrior Frenzy
locale.synopsis: A beat'em all game in a metal atmosphere. 4 playable characters: Knuckle, Rikki, Neff and Keem.
Un jeu beat'em all dans une ambiance metal. 4 personnages jouables : Knuckle, Rikki, Neff et Keem.

locale.title: World Heroes - Supreme Justice Extra
locale.synopsis: World Heroes Supreme Justice Extra is a classic side scroller arcade beat 'em up where you fight against the forces of Zeus and Neo-Dio. World Heroes Supreme Justice Extra has five playable characters + 6 secret characters to unlock plus features two player co-op. The game uses 4 buttons to punch, kick, jump and block as well as a lot of special moves, combos, and Kick/Punch combos.

locale.title: X-men
locale.synopsis: X-Men is a Beats of Rage mod created by VicViper & Kungpow, it features the Marvel superhero team which includes Iceman, Jean Grey, Psylocke and Wolverine.

locale.title: X-men Guerra Dos Clones
locale.synopsis: This game follows the story of the original, but with changes in characters because of the style of play. These characters will be selectable: nightcrawler, storm, cyclops, beast, gambit, wolverine and magneto.
